hero.p1: Graduated with MSc Fintech and Business Analytics from
hero.des0: A highly motivated and technically proficient professional with a background in Fintech and Business Analytics and a degree in Computer Science Engineering. With over 3 years of hands-on experience in financial analysis, programming, and data management, I specialize in systematic trading strategies, financial modeling, and large-scale data analysis. I have a proven track record of driving innovation through Python, R, VBA, and advanced data processing techniques, and thrive in fast-paced environments that require a deep understanding of financial markets and derivatives.
hero.des1: Having worked in both financial services and technology, I bring a unique blend of skills that allow me to build efficient, data-driven models and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. My analytical mindset, coupled with strong communication and project management skills, enables me to translate complex data into actionable insights, ensuring successful project outcomes and client satisfaction.
hero.des2: With a passion for staying ahead of industry trends and a keen interest in systematic trading and index strategies, I am eager to leverage my expertise to contribute to innovative financial products and solutions.
